content.rendered:
IIS Bangalore invites admissions to its range of academic programmes. As parents who wish the best level of education for their children, they can visit the campus or connect with us to get any query clarified. We have rolled out a simple admissions process that will ensure that you get answers to all your queries before you confirm the admissions at IISB.

You can also enquire about the teacher credentials, the curriculum to be covered for a specific class, and the tests to be conducted at different point in time during the academic year.

Our objective is to provide as much information as possible so that you can make the right decision with your child’s academics.

In case you still have any specific queries then do feel free to contact us.
